// 解密
let key = java.base64DecodeToByteArray("lXsAUe1NZEw6tAxM9w1Tpq2tU4la2+PwM8evj2C+yB0=")
let iv = java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==")
let aes = Packages.cn.hutool.crypto.symmetric.AES("CBC","PKCS5Padding", key, iv)
let app_version = source.getLoginHeaderMap()['app_version']
let account = source.getLoginHeaderMap()['account']
let login_token = source.getLoginHeaderMap()['login_token']
let device_token = source.getLoginHeaderMap()['device_token']
// 章节列表
let res = JSON.parse(aes.decryptStr(result))
if(res.tip) { 
   java.toast(res.tip)
   throw new Error(res.tip)
}
let chList = []
res.data.chapter_list.forEach(volList => {
 chList.push({title: volList.division_name,voltype: true})
 volList.chapter_list.forEach(item=>{
   chList.push({
    cid: item.chapter_id,
    title: item.chapter_title,
    isVip: item.is_paid&&item.auth_access==0,
    isPay: item.auth_access,
    url: `https://sk.hbooker.com/chapter/get_chapter_command?app_version=${app_version}&chapter_id=${item.chapter_id}&login_token=${login_token}&account=${account}&device_token=${device_token}`,
    info: `更新时间 ${item.mtime} 字数 ${item.word_count}`
   })
 })
})
chList
</js>

loginUrl:
<js>
// 工具类
var key = java.base64DecodeToByteArray("lXsAUe1NZEw6tAxM9w1Tpq2tU4la2+PwM8evj2C+yB0=")
var iv = java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==")
var aes = Packages.cn.hutool.crypto.symmetric.AES("CBC","PKCS5Padding", key, iv)
var RandomUtil = Packages.cn.hutool.core.util.RandomUtil
// 参数
let userInfo = source.getLoginInfoMap()
let username = userInfo['手机号码/邮箱']
let password = userInfo['密码']
let app_version = "2.9.290"
let device_token = `shuke_${RandomUtil.randomNumbers(15)}`
let login_token = RandomUtil.randomString(32)
let account = `%E4%B9%A6%E5%AE%A2${RandomUtil.randomNumbers(12)}`
let uuid = `android${java.randomUUID()}`
let params = `app_version=${app_version}&device_token=${device_token}&login_token=${login_token}&account=${account}`

// 账号登录
function login(params, username, password){
  var loginUrl = `https://sk.hbooker.com/signup/login?${params}&login_name=${username}&passwd=${password}`
  var autoRegUrl = `https://sk.hbooker.com/signup/auto_reg?oauth_union_id=&app_version=${app_version}&gender=1&oauth_open_id=&device_token=${device_token}&channel=TX&oauth_type=&uuid=${uuid}`
  // 是否游客
  let isLogin = !source.getLoginHeader()
  let isAuto = username == '' && password == ''
  if(isAuto && !isLogin ){ 
     throw new Error("请勿重复登录,如若需要请清除登录头和Cookie")
  }
  var url = isAuto ? autoRegUrl : loginUrl
  // 获取登录信息
  let res = JSON.parse(aes.decryptStr(java.ajax(url)))
  if(res.tip) throw new Error(res.tip)
  let login_token = res.data.login_token
  let user_code = res.data.user_code
  let reader_name = res.data.reader_info.reader_name
  let account = res.data.reader_info.account
  let rest_hlb = res.data.prop_info.rest_hlb
  java.toast(`${reader_name}【剩余欢乐币:${rest_hlb}】,登录成功!`)
  // 获取书架
  let bookList = java.ajax(`https://sk.hbooker.com/bookshelf/get_shelf_list?app_version=${app_version}&device_token=${device_token}&login_token=${login_token}&account=${account}`)
  let shelf_list = JSON.parse(aes.decryptStr(bookList)).data.shelf_list[0]
  let shelf_id = shelf_list.shelf_id
  let reader_id = shelf_list.reader_id
  // 登录完成
  let header = {
    "app_version": String(app_version),
    "device_token": String(device_token),
    "login_token": String(login_token),
    "account": encodeURIComponent(account),
    "user_code": String(user_code),
    "shelf_id": String(shelf_id),
    "reader_name": encodeURIComponent(reader_name),
    "reader_id": String(reader_id),
    "rest_hlb": String(rest_hlb)
  }
  return JSON.stringify(header)
}
// 写入登录头
source.putLoginHeader(login(params,username.trim(),password.trim()))
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
// 解密
let key = java.base64DecodeToByteArray("lXsAUe1NZEw6tAxM9w1Tpq2tU4la2+PwM8evj2C+yB0=")
let iv = java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==")
let aes = Packages.cn.hutool.crypto.symmetric.AES("CBC","PKCS5Padding", key, iv)
result = aes.decryptStr(result)
let tip = JSON.parse(result).tip
if(tip) {
   java.toast(tip)
   throw new Error(tip)
}
</js>

ruleSearch.lastChapter:
<js>
let title = java.getString("last_chapter_info.chapter_title")
let time = java.getString("last_chapter_info.uptime")
if(!/第.*章/.test(title)){
  title = `第${java.getString("last_chapter_info.chapter_index")}章 ` + title
}
`${title} • ${time}`
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
// 解密
function decrypt(str1, str2){
  let key = java.base64DecodeToByteArray(java.digestBase64Str(str2,"sha256"))
  let iv = java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==")
  let aes = Packages.cn.hutool.crypto.symmetric.AES("CBC","PKCS5Padding", key, iv)
  return aes.decryptStr(str1)
}
// 获取密钥
let app_version = source.getLoginHeaderMap()['app_version']
let device_token = source.getLoginHeaderMap()['device_token']
let account = source.getLoginHeaderMap()['account']
let login_token = source.getLoginHeaderMap()['login_token']
let rest_hlb = source.getLoginHeaderMap()['rest_hlb']
let key = "zG2nSeEfSHfvTCHy5LCcqtBbQehKNLXn"
let cid = baseUrl.match(/chapter_id=(\d+)/)[1]
let result = JSON.parse(decrypt(result,key))
let tip = result.tip
if(tip){
 java.toast(tip)
 throw new Error(tip)	
}
let cmd = result.data.command
// 正文内容
let body = java.ajax(`https://sk.hbooker.com/chapter/get_cpt_ifm?chapter_command=${cmd}&app_version=${app_version}&chapter_id=${cid}&login_token=${login_token}&account=${account}&device_token=${device_token}`)
let chInfo = JSON.parse(decrypt(body,key)).data.chapter_info
let unit_hlb = java.put('unit_hlb', chInfo.unit_hlb)
let content = decrypt(chInfo.txt_content,cmd)
let isPay = chInfo.is_paid && chInfo.auth_access == 0
let payText = `\n本章是VIP章节，购买后才能阅读\n本章需要${unit_hlb}币, 您有${rest_hlb}币,请点击右上角的购买按钮购买本章(请勿乱点)，购买后自动加入到个人书架！`
 isPay ? content + payText : content 
</js>

ruleExplore.name: $.book_name||$.book_info.book_name
ruleExplore.author: $.author_name||$.book_info.author_name
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
let key = java.base64DecodeToByteArray("lXsAUe1NZEw6tAxM9w1Tpq2tU4la2+PwM8evj2C+yB0=")
let iv = java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==")
let aes = Packages.cn.hutool.crypto.symmetric.AES("CBC","PKCS5Padding", key, iv)
result = aes.decryptStr(result)
let res = JSON.parse(result)
if(res.tip) { 
   java.toast(res.tip)
   throw new Error(res.tip)
}
if(/get_task_bonus_with_sign_recommend.*/.test(baseUrl)){
	java.toast(`签到成功,获得${res.data.bonus.hlb}欢乐币`)
	result=[]
}
</js>
$.data.book_list[*]
ruleExplore.lastChapter:
<js>
let title = java.getString("last_chapter_info.chapter_title")
let time = java.getString("last_chapter_info.uptime")
let index = java.getString("last_chapter_info.chapter_index")
if(!/第.*章/.test(title)){
  title = `第${index}章 ${title}`
}
!/bookshelf.*/.test(baseUrl) ? `${title} • ${time}` : ''
</js>

bookSourceComment:
◎直接点登录(游客登录)，若有账号再输入账号登录，不要改登录规则里的东西
◎因为操作过多，若点击登录无反应请重试
◎若报错请删除登录头和Cookie后重新登录
◎特性: 登陆|游客登录|签到|书架|发现页|购买（需要升级到最新版本≥3.22.081219）

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var json=JSON.parse(result).Data;
var bid=json.BookId;
var base="https://m.qidian.com/book/"+bid+"/";

json.Chapters.slice(1).map(ch=>({
title:ch.N,
link:base+ch.C,
vip:ch.V,
time:java.timeFormat(ch.T)
}))
</js>

let key = java.base64DecodeToByteArray("lXsAUe1NZEw6tAxM9w1Tpq2tU4la2+PwM8evj2C+yB0=")
let iv = java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==")
let aes = Packages.cn.hutool.crypto.symmetric.AES("CBC","PKCS5Padding", key, iv)
let app_version = source.getLoginHeaderMap()['app_version']
let account = source.getLoginHeaderMap()['account']
let login_token = source.getLoginHeaderMap()['login_token']
let device_token = source.getLoginHeaderMap()['device_token']
// 章节列表
let res = JSON.parse(aes.decryptStr(result))
if(res.tip) { 
   java.toast(res.tip)
   throw new Error(res.tip)
}
let chList = []
res.data.chapter_list.forEach(volList => {
 chList.push({title: volList.division_name,voltype: true})
 volList.chapter_list.forEach(item=>{
   chList.push({
    cid: item.chapter_id,
    title: item.chapter_title,
    isVip: item.is_paid&&item.auth_access==0,
    isPay: item.auth_access,
    url: `https://sk.hbooker.com/chapter/get_chapter_command?app_version=${app_version}&chapter_id=${item.chapter_id}&login_token=${login_token}&account=${account}&device_token=${device_token}`,
    info: `更新时间 ${item.mtime} 字数 ${item.word_count}`
   })
 })
})
chList

loginUrl:
<js>
// 工具类
var key = java.base64DecodeToByteArray("lXsAUe1NZEw6tAxM9w1Tpq2tU4la2+PwM8evj2C+yB0=")
var iv = java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==")
var aes = Packages.cn.hutool.crypto.symmetric.AES("CBC","PKCS5Padding", key, iv)
var RandomUtil = Packages.cn.hutool.core.util.RandomUtil
// 参数
let userInfo = source.getLoginInfoMap()
let username = userInfo['手机号码/邮箱'].trim()
let password = userInfo['密码'].trim()
let app_version = "2.9.290"
let device_token = `shuke_${RandomUtil.randomNumbers(15)}`
let login_token = RandomUtil.randomString(32)
let account = `%E4%B9%A6%E5%AE%A2${RandomUtil.randomNumbers(12)}`
let uuid = `android${java.randomUUID()}`
var params = `app_version=${app_version}&device_token=${device_token}&login_token=${login_token}&account=${account}`
// 账号登录
function login(username, password){
  var loginUrl = `https://sk.hbooker.com/signup/login?${params}&login_name=${username}&passwd=${password}`
  var autoRegUrl = `https://sk.hbooker.com/signup/auto_reg?oauth_union_id=&app_version=${app_version}&gender=1&oauth_open_id=&device_token=${device_token}&channel=TX&oauth_type=&uuid=${uuid}`
  // 是否游客
  let isLogin = !source.getLoginHeader()
  let isAuto = username == '' || password == ''
  if(isAuto && !isLogin){ 
     throw new Error("请勿重复登录,如若需要请清除登录头和Cookie")
  }
  var url = isAuto ? autoRegUrl : loginUrl
  // 获取登录信息
  let res = JSON.parse(aes.decryptStr(java.ajax(url)))
  if(res.tip) {
    throw new Error(isAuto ? '自动登陆失败,请输入账号或切换网络重新登陆' : '账号登陆失败,请尝试切换网络或者等待几小时后重新登陆')
  }
  let login_token = res.data.login_token
  let user_code = res.data.user_code
  let reader_name = res.data.reader_info.reader_name
  let account = res.data.reader_info.account
  let rest_hlb = res.data.prop_info.rest_hlb
  java.toast(isAuto ? '自动登陆成功,若有账号请输入账号进行登陆' : `${reader_name}【剩余欢乐币:${rest_hlb}】,登录成功!`)
  // 获取书架
  let bookList = java.ajax(`https://sk.hbooker.com/bookshelf/get_shelf_list?app_version=${app_version}&device_token=${device_token}&login_token=${login_token}&account=${account}`)
  let shelf_list = JSON.parse(aes.decryptStr(bookList)).data.shelf_list[0]
  let shelf_id = shelf_list.shelf_id
  let reader_id = shelf_list.reader_id
  // 登录完成
  let header = {
    "app_version": String(app_version),
    "device_token": String(device_token),
    "login_token": String(login_token),
    "account": encodeURIComponent(account),
    "user_code": String(user_code),
    "shelf_id": String(shelf_id),
    "reader_name": encodeURIComponent(reader_name),
    "reader_id": String(reader_id),
    "rest_hlb": String(rest_hlb)
  }
  return JSON.stringify(header)
}
// 写入登录头
header = login(username,password)
source.putLoginHeader(header)
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
// 解密
function decrypt(str1, str2){
  let key = java.base64DecodeToByteArray(java.digestBase64Str(str2,"sha256"))
  let iv = java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==")
  let aes = Packages.cn.hutool.crypto.symmetric.AES("CBC","PKCS5Padding", key, iv)
  return aes.decryptStr(str1)
}
let headerMap = source.getLoginHeaderMap()
// 获取密钥
let app_version = headerMap['app_version']
let device_token = headerMap['device_token']
let account = headerMap['account']
let login_token = headerMap['login_token']
let rest_hlb = headerMap['rest_hlb']
let key = "zG2nSeEfSHfvTCHy5LCcqtBbQehKNLXn"
let cid = baseUrl.match(/chapter_id=(\d+)/)[1]
let result = JSON.parse(decrypt(result,key))
let tip = result.tip
if(tip){
 java.toast(tip)
 throw new Error(tip)	
}
let cmd = result.data.command
// 正文内容
let body = java.ajax(`https://sk.hbooker.com/chapter/get_cpt_ifm?chapter_command=${cmd}&app_version=${app_version}&chapter_id=${cid}&login_token=${login_token}&account=${account}&device_token=${device_token}`)
let chInfo = JSON.parse(decrypt(body,key)).data.chapter_info
let unit_hlb = java.put('unit_hlb', chInfo.unit_hlb)
let content = decrypt(chInfo.txt_content,cmd)
let isPay = chInfo.is_paid && chInfo.auth_access == 0
let payText = `\n本章是VIP章节，购买后才能阅读\n本章需要${unit_hlb}币, 您有${rest_hlb}币,请点击右上角的购买按钮购买本章(请勿乱点)，购买后自动加入到个人书架！`
isPay ? content + payText : content 
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
var headerMap = source.getLoginHeaderMap()
// 参数
let app_version = headerMap['app_version']
let account = headerMap['account']
let login_token = headerMap['login_token']
let device_token = headerMap['device_token']
let rest_hlb = headerMap['rest_hlb']
let params = `app_version=${app_version}&device_token=${device_token}&login_token=${login_token}&account=${account}`
let key = java.base64DecodeToByteArray("lXsAUe1NZEw6tAxM9w1Tpq2tU4la2+PwM8evj2C+yB0=")
let iv = java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==")
let aes = Packages.cn.hutool.crypto.symmetric.AES("CBC","PKCS5Padding", key, iv)
// 获取数据
result = aes.decryptStr(result)
let res = JSON.parse(result)
// 签到
if(/get_task_bonus_with_sign_recommend.*/.test(baseUrl)){
  let hlb = res.tip ? 0 : Number(res.data.bonus.hlb)
  // 获取书币
  let walletUrl = `https://app.happybooker.cn/reader/get_wallet_info?${params}`
  let walletRes = JSON.parse(aes.decryptStr(java.ajax(walletUrl)))
  rest_hlb = walletRes.tip ? rest_hlb : Number(walletRes.data.wallet_info.rest_hlb) + hlb
  let message = res.tip ? `${res.tip},当前剩余${rest_hlb}欢乐币`:`签到成功,获得${hlb}欢乐币,当前剩余${rest_hlb}欢乐币`
  source.putLoginHeader(Object.assign(headerMap,{'rest_hlb': String(rest_hlb)}))
  java.toast(message)
  result={}
} else if(res.tip) { 
   java.toast(res.tip)
   throw new Error(res.tip)
   result={}
}
</js>
$.data.book_list[*]||$.data.daily_task_list[*]

bookSourceComment:
◎开始使用时(搜索或调试)会自动游客登陆,若有账号请再输入账号登陆
◎注意重复登录现在会触发验证码检查, 有封号的风险
◎若要切换账号,请在[登陆界面]菜单中清除账号和密码进行[游客登录],再输入账号和密码登陆
◎重复{点击√}登陆会在一段时间内无法账号登陆(需要等几个小时);如果需要请切换网络[wifi/数据]重新尝试登陆,登陆成功后请勿频繁切换账号
◎若报错请删除登陆按钮里面的登录头(登陆界面右上角的选项里),并且清除Cookie后重新再次进行登录
◎因为操作过多，若点击登录√无反应请等待一会
◎特性: 登陆|游客登录|签到|书架|发现页|购买（需要升级到最新版本≥3.22.081219）

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
pages=java.get('page');
page=parseInt(pages/50);
url=String(java.get('url'));
list=[];
if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}
for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*50)))
}
list
</js>

bookSourceComment:
只看楼主
◎编辑书籍详情页，在简介内容填上 【只看楼主】  保存，刷新书籍页（有已缓存的正文记得正文也要刷新）
◎内容只有楼主发帖，无作者名时间等

去空行
◎层与层之间有一行空行，不想要空行的话
◎就在书籍详情页的简介内容填上【去空行】
◎只看楼主跟去空行随便怎么写，写对字就行


发现规则url
贴吧名::https://tieba.baidu.com/mo/q/m?word=贴吧名（不要写吧字）&page_from_search=index&tn6=bdISP&tn4=bdKSW&tn7=bdPSB&lm=16842752&lp=6093&sub4=%E8%BF%9B%E5%90%A7&pn={{(page-1)*30}}

exploreUrl:
<js>
var cat1='都市生活,东方玄幻,古典仙侠,现代修真,都市超能,架空历史,军事战争,虚拟网游,时空穿梭,末世净化';
var cat2='穿越,重生,异界,修真,都市,异能';
var cat3='修仙,奇遇,奋斗,争霸,权谋,升级文';
var list=[];
function getUrl(cats,url1){
cats.split(',').forEach((i)=>{list.push(i+'::'+url1+i+'&query='+i+'&page={{page}}')});
}
list.push('男生分类→::');
getUrl(cat1,'/api/getCateDetail?channel=男频&status=完结&count=10&cate2=');
list.push('男生背景→::');
getUrl(cat2,'/api/getCateDetail?channel=男频&status=完结&count=10&tag_name=');
list.push('男生情节→::');
getUrl(cat3,'/api/getCateDetail?channel=男频&status=完结&count=10&tag_name=');
list.join('\n');
</js>
